DOC.brief_summary: Tegaserod (HTF919) is an aminoguanidine indole compound and a member of a new class of subgroup-selective 5-hydroxytryptamine (5-HT) agonists. The aim of this study is to investigate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of tegaserod on bowel habits in patients with CC.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Tegaserod in Patients With Chronic Constipation
